sentences.en: A multidirectional television antenna ; multidirectional stereo speakers.
A new nonlinear weighted average multidirectional morphological filtering algorithm is proposed, which is used in suppressing speckle noise.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种新的用于散斑噪声抑制的非线性加权均值多方向形态滤波算法。

sentences.en: A new recording system for generating the multidirectional holographic phase gratings is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种记录多方向全息相位光栅的新光路,详细介绍了此光路的调整方法.

sentences.en: Above result revealed that multidirectional closed die forging of spiral bevel gear was feasible.
sentences.cn: 揭示了使用复动闭式模锻模具成形小锥角螺旋伞齿轮的可行性.

sentences.en: Because mobile phones enable multidirectional flows of information even in the most remote parts of the world, they have the power to transform health care.
sentences.cn: 主要还是因为手机能将多元的资讯传送到天涯海角，它们才有改革健康医疗的威力。

sentences.en: These will provide good basis for the investigation of multidirectional winding machine with more perfect function.
sentences.cn: 这些将为开发功能更完备的大型多向纤维缠绕机械提供很好的实践基础.

sentences.en: TOP BUZZ - High speed multidirectional movements guaranteeing the riders a space travel like disorientation experience.
sentences.cn: 急速大风车 —— 高速多向的旋转会使乘坐者领会到迷失在宇宙中的感受.
